Thanks Zack. I agree, I'd need many more results to really get a good pictu=
re of things.

--- On Thu, 8/19/10, Zack Widup <w9sz.zack@...> wrote:=


From: Zack Widup <w9sz.zack@...>
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Run for liv=
es!--or not.
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Date: Thursday, August 19, 2010, 1=
1:07 AM







=C2=A0



  


    
      
      
      When I go to a "haun=
ted" place to try to get some EVP, etc, I'd say at least 90% of the time I =
get nothing. Yet I keep going back and sometimes eventually get something.
=
=C2=A0
I haven't seen anything wrong with your experiments. I haven't gotte=
n the idea you are trying to prove or disprove anything.=C2=A0As you noted,=
 you aren't doing any harm and you aren't touting them acros the web.=C2=A0=
But I'd say keep doing them. You need a much larger database.

=C2=A0
Zack
=

=C2=A0
On Thu, Aug 19, 2010 at 12:26 PM, Rj <rasterer@...> wrote:


=
=C2=A0 







Since my personal results do not show anything paranormal,=
=C2=A0 I ask experts to help with the tests: the experts being the people h=
ere. That I way I can learn.=C2=A0 I have contributed a testing process so =
far, run several public tests, and even though they were not positive resul=
ts, I did not "tout it all over the web".=C2=A0 I have not criticized.=C2=
=A0 I just don't automatically believe everything people tell me.=C2=A0 

=
=C2=A0
I don't understand why you would think that should be reason to be k=
icked out of the group.

or yourself. There are some here that suggest you be kicked off the group c=
uz you contribute nothing, can't do any recordings of your own, can't hear =
any of the EVPs, can't see any of the images, yet are quick to criticize an=
d test everyone else. 

=C2=A0

=C2=A0Same old thing, heard them talking about "=
it hits the earth" again last night while testing one of those single suppl=
y dual sweep boxes, so set up a hack radio I had handy. "--BehindTheSun--Co=
mesFarFromEarth--(jack-frag)IsComin'--Session-EarthWillThenCollide-ItEnds--=
Comet-Good(?)". The jack thing is Jack FM, 105.5 FM a rock station. Presuma=
ble 2012. The December 21st date from the Mayans seems=C2=A0to be a middle =
number, there's like a window right around Christmas, as they seem to menti=
on the 17th along with this stuff. Who knows if it means anything, but what=
 I don't like are those that profess to "know better". 

=C2=A0

nconverted wave sounds a littel better, but it's over 3mb.

nk-S
